desc: We specialize in handmade, natural bath & body products with a focus on enjoying an aromatherapy experience. For home environments are soy candles and reeds. We use organic plant-based ingredients, high quality essential and fragrance oils. We are an eco-conscious company, using no toxic ingredients. Est. 2020.

layout.text:
Our soaps, bath bombs, bath truffles and soy
wax candles are created with 100% plant-based
ingredients, with high quality essential oils and
phthalate free fragrance oils.  Your skin is
provided with the most intensive moisturizing
and nourishing benefits, with aromatherapy
fragrances to help improve your mood and spirit.
